artist: Artist: Joel Janowitz; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
description: vertical format; abstracted image with leaves and trellis-like structure at top; greens, blues, yellows; torn at edges and attached to backing sheet Monoprint combining five color bleed printed lithographically using split­fount inking from three plates on Okawara paper and monotyping by the artist. The print was then colléd to the Arches Cover backing sheet. Being a variant edition, the prints were signed with Roman numerals I/XII -XII/XII. Number XI/XII image size is 39 1/2 x 20 in. and the backing sheet is 43 x 23 in.
image_copyright: Copyright © Joel Janowitz%2C published by Highpoint Editions
markings:
Numbered in pencil, LL: X/XII
Publisher\'s blindstamp, LLC: HP (intertwined, inside a square)
medium: Color lithograph and monotype, with Okawara chine collé on Arches Cover paper
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2006.
signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LR: Janowitz 2005
title: Scroll (X)
